title: Interior chowk : Wherever habitable rooms or kitchen derive ventilation from inner chowk or interior
clause_text: Interior chowk : Wherever habitable rooms or kitchen derive ventilation from inner chowk or interior open space, the minimum size of such interior open space shall not be less than
